title: Patch 7.7 alpha client font is blurry.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
As you can see in the link, my problem is that I think league is stuck on low spec mode... and my PC is good (8 gb 2666mhz gtx 1070 i5-7600k and my league font is like that. I provided screenshots of my alpha client in all different resolutions as well as the settings on my league client. I just wanna have my normal font again. It hurts having this bad font on my client.
Things I have tried:
1. Restart PC
2. Full league client repair
3. Search for graphics driver updates (none)
4. Reinstall
Those are all the things I have tried and still hasn't solved the issue. Does anybody know a solution?
Signing out, Askehavee

replies.body:
Thanks for trying out all those steps!  Are you on a 4K monitor?  There could be a scaling issue that's causing your font to look all muddled.  Try out this step to see if helps.

- Right click the League of Legends Launcher
- Select the Properties option on the dropdown menu
- Click on the Compatibility Tab
- Uncheck the “Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings” box
- Then, Check the “Run as Administrator” box.
- Click Apply.
- Launch the game.

Let me know if that helps!
I don't believe it worked :/ though thank you for the help! Edit: nevermind it worked!! Thank you a lot for help.
I don't believe it worked :/ though thank you for the help!
